mapper.insert: INSERT INTO store(id, pw, tel, name, address, point, chk, longitude, latitude, category) Values(#{id}, #{pw}, #{tel}, #{name}, #{address}, 0, 2, #{longitude}, #{latitude}, #{category})
INSERT INTO menu(id, name, cost, img, tag, tip) VALUES(#{id}, #{name}, #{cost}, #{img}, #{tag}, #{tip})
INSERT INTO storeinfo(storeid, minprice, deliverytip, deliverytime, storeintro) VALUES(#{storeid}, #{minprice}, #{deliverytip}, #{deliverytime}, #{storeintro})
INSERT INTO starpoint(userid, storeid, starpoint, body, menu) VALUES(#{userid}, #{storeid}, #{starpoint}, #{body}, #{menu})
INSERT INTO storestarpoint(starnum, storeid, body) VALUES(#{starnum}, #{storeid}, #{body})
mapper.update: UPDATE starpoint SET starpoint = #{starpoint}, body = #{body} WHERE userid = #{userid} and storeid = #{storeid}
UPDATE storestarpoint SET body = #{body} WHERE storeid = #{storeid} and storenum = #{storenum}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM likes WHERE userid = #{userid} and storeid = #{storeid}
